item.title: Discussion for Home page
item.description:
Bin Tu,

The appropriate place to ask for help is on the mailing list at

pdb2pqr-users@lists.sourceforge.net

Post your question there and I'll reply to it on that forum. After you have sent your message I will delete these comments.

-Kyle
item.dc:creator: Kyle Monson

item.title: XRC generation uses class "unknown" for search control.
item.description:
When a wxSearchCtrl is added to a project the associated XRC code for the control is not correct.

Actual:

<object class="unknown" name="m_searchCtrl_word_list" />

Expected:

<object class="wxSearchCtrl" name="m_searchCtrl_word_list">
    <style>wxTE_NOHIDESEL|wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER</style>
</object>

The Python code created appears correct.
item.dc:creator: Kyle Monson

item.title: XRC generation uses class "unknown" for search control.
